Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 9-2013. A 9-year-old 
boy with fever, cough, respiratory distress, and chest pain.
Fracchia MS(1), El Saleeby CM, Murali MR, Sagar P, Mino-Kenudson M.

Author information:
(1)Department of Pediatrics, Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, USA.
